channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Shopping for an EV or Plug-In Hybrid? Here Are the Ones Built in the US
item.description: Donald Trump’s import tariffs will put pressure on the EV market. But these US-assembled battery-powered cars may avoid the worst of the price hikes.

item.title: 7 Best Natural Deodorants, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: Want to go aluminum-free without being stinky? These WIRED-tested picks have you covered.
